definition: black atractylodes rhizome (dried rhizome of any of several atractylodes species) (TCM)
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To observe the effect of air sterilization by the herbal medicine Changshu disinfectant.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察苍术消毒剂对空气消毒的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the pharmacological effects oft he different components of atractylodes chinensis.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较苍术不同部位的药理作用。

sentences.english: The Atractylone in sample solution was kept stable in nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 样品溶液中的苍术酮经充氮气后保持稳定。

sentences.english: Remote sensing technology was used for investigation of the resources of Atractylodes lancea .
sentences.chinese: 利用遥感技术对野生中药苍术的资源量进行了调查。

definition: the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
